directions: Mix together the sugar, butter or margarine and the milk in a large pot and bring to a boil.  Boil for 2 minutes.
Turn off heat and add in the pudding, oats and vanilla.  Mix well and let stand for 5 minutes.
Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper.
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
title: Easy No Bake Cookies
